About The ProjectÔÉÅ

This is the documentation of our repository Smart Notice Bot

üòÆ Didn‚Äôt you ever get information late because you couldn‚Äôt check the notice on time?

üòÆ Don‚Äôt you want to get only the notice you want?

Smart Notice Bot will solve it.

Smart Notice Bot is an open source project that sends a main notice of university through email. The inconvenience of checking notices on various sites every day will disappear and only the notices and information you want will be provided by e-mail.

FeaturesÔÉÅ

  • After signing up for membership on the website, select your department, e-mail, and interests.

  • Whenever articles such as what users need (employment, start-up, graduate school, internship, etc.) are updated, they are sent by e-mail.

  • Frequent questions (FAQs) are provided on the website.

ContributingÔÉÅ

Contributions, issues are welcome. You can submit a PR to this repository and it will be depolyed once it‚Äôs accepted. You can write the commit message including PR Title as follows. ..code:

$ git commit -m "PR Title"
